suite.name: Profile

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Run Browser
kw.doc: Opens browsers for running test cases

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance. Use this keyword for quick experiments or debugging sessions. Use `New Page` directly instead of `Open Browser` for production and automated execution. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.

test.name: Verify User's Credentials Saved After Registration

kw.name: Go To Registration Page

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Set Username Text
kw.doc: provides date for username

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Abbas1' in the given field.

kw.name: Set Secret Password
kw.doc: provides date for username

kw.name: Fill Secret
kw.doc: Fills the given secret from ``variable_name`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
